General.Name: CCCG Real Estate Corp Ltd
General.Description: CCCG Real Estate Corporation Limited develops, operates, and sells real estate properties in China. It operates through Real Estate Development, and Property and Leasing segments. It develops and sells various residential and commercial real estate projects, as well as offers property management, real estate leasing, and project investment management and agency construction services. The company was formerly known as China Real Estate Corporation Limited and changed its name to CCCG Real Estate Corporation Limited in October 2017. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Chongqing, China. CCCG Real Estate Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of CCCC Real Estate Group Co., Ltd.
